headline: BAE Systems Secures a Contract to Support E-2D Hawkeye Jets
summary: BAESY secures a $62.5M U.S. Navy contract to deliver engineering and technical support for E-2D Hawkeye jets through 2030.

headline: Textron Supplies XM204 Top Attack Anti-Vehicle Munition to US Army
summary: TXT supplies its XM204 Top Attack Munition to the U.S. Army, boosting counter-mobility and terrain-shaping operations.

headline: RTX unveils new APG-82(V)X radar enhanced with gallium nitride
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has unveiled the latest iteration of its combat-proven APG-82 radar, the APG-82(V)X. The new radar variant incorporates cutting-edge gallium nitride (GaN) technology to enhance the radar's effectiveness, delivering increased range, advanced air-to-air, air-to-ground and electronic warfare capabilities.

headline: Global 4D Imaging Radar Market Projected to Become Billion Dollar Revenue Opportunity as Military Ops Dependency Expands
summary: The global 4D Imaging Radar Market has been growing in recent years at a substantial growth rate and is expected to continue according to industry watchdogs. A report from MarketsAndMarkets projects that the global 4D Imaging Radar Market, which was valued at USD 335.7 million in 2024 is projected to grow from USD 392.8 million in 2025 to USD 1,206.9 million by 2030, at a CAGR of 25.2% during the forecast period. headline: RTX's Pratt & Whitney accelerates development of NGAP engine
summary: Pratt & Whitney, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, is accelerating the development of its XA103 engine for the U.S. Air Force's Next Generation Adaptive Propulsion (NGAP) program with the use of digital data packages.
